content: Harborview Orthopedic submitted claim VRX55721 for arthroscopic chondroplasty performed on 11/03/2023 at Seattle Specialty Surgical Center. The 52-year-old male construction worker presented with advanced osteochondral defects in both knees, a common occupational injury. Pre-authorization noted prior conservative treatments failed, with documentation including six weeks of physical therapy at Northwest Rehab Clinic.
